MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA7 postcode area of Runcorn affecting properties in Malmesbury Park, Buckfast Court, Dorchester Park and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 7:45am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible and we expect restoration restored by 9:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:50am on 5th March 2021.
